title: Grilled Lemon-Herb Chicken Salad
short_description: A nutritious salad with flavorful grilled chicken, fresh greens and a tangy lemon-herb dressing.
ingredients: A handful of pitted Kalamata olives

steps.title: Prepare Chicken Marinade
steps.description: Combine olive oil, minced garlic, half the lemon zest and juice, oregano, and generous pinches of salt and pepper in a bowl. Add chicken breasts, ensuring they're well coated, and marinate for 15 minutes.

steps.title: Grill Chicken
steps.description: Heat a grill to medium-high. Grill chicken breasts for 6 minutes each side or until fully cooked. Let rest before slicing crosswise.

steps.title: Assemble Salad
steps.description: In a large salad bowl, toss together the salad greens, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and red onion.

steps.title: Prepare Dressing
steps.description: Whisk remaining lemon zest and juice with balsamic vinegar and extra virgin olive oil. Season with salt and pepper.

steps.title: Combine Salad with Dressing
steps.description: Pour the dressing over the salad mixture, toss to coat everything evenly. Scatter feta cheese and olives on top.

steps.title: Serve
steps.description: Plate the salad and top each portion with sliced grilled chicken. Serve immediately.
